name: Memlet
tagline: MEMLET is a Graphical User Interface designed to fit single molecule and other biophysical data using Maximum Likelihood Estimation
body:
#Download MEMLET Now:

##Description
MLEEP is an easy to use, MATLAB -based, Maximum Likelihood Estimation (MLE) fitting tool. It was designed to provide many of the powerful features of MLE to a wide variety of users. It can run either within the MATLAB environment, or is available as a standalone version which can be run on any computer with a free runtime download.  The full features and uses of MLEEP are fully described in its documentation and the accompanying publication, but include: 
-	No need to bin data
-	Significance testing of competing models
-	Correction for dead time/minimum detectable event (MDE)
-	Global Fitting
-	Determination of confidence intervals using bootstrapping 
-	Fits Multidimensional Datasets 
-	Optional Command line interface
	
##Download the Latest Version of MLEEP
Download Everything (recommended) - Includes script files, standalone version, Demo Data, Tutorial and Full Help file  
Matlab script files only (require Matlab Installation and License)  
Standalone Program (does not require Matlab, will prompt for free download of Matlab Runtime)  
Download Documentation and Tutorials
